languages.text: "Если благородные дома столь нестабильны, зачем мне их содержать?"
"If the noble houses are so volatile, what sense is there in keeping them?"
languages.original_text: "Если благородные дома столь нестабильны, зачем мне их содержать?"

traits.locale_text: "If the noble houses are so volatile, what sense does it make for me to keep them?"
"If the noble houses are so volatile, what sense does it make for me to keep them?"
"If the noble houses are so volatile, what sense is there in keeping them?"
"If the noble houses are so volatile, what sense is there in keeping them?"
"If the noble houses are so volatile, what sense is there in keeping them?"

languages.text: “既然这些贵族家族这么不可靠，那为什么还要留着他们？”
languages.original_text: "If the noble houses are so volatile, what sense is there in keeping them?"

traits.locale_text: “既然这些贵族家族这么不可靠，那为什么还要留着他们？”

languages.text: «Si las casas nobles son tan volátiles, ¿de qué sirve conservarlas?».
languages.original_text: "If the noble houses are so volatile, what sense is there in keeping them?"

traits.locale_text: «Si las casas nobles son tan volátiles, ¿de qué sirve conservarlas?».

languages.text: 「貴族家系がそこまで不安定ならば、彼らを残しておく必要はないのでは？」
languages.original_text: "If the noble houses are so volatile, what sense is there in keeping them?"

traits.locale_text: 「貴族家系がそこまで不安定ならば、彼らを残しておく必要はないのでは？」

languages.text: "Wenn die Adelshäuser so unzuverlässig sind, warum behalten wir sie dann?"
languages.original_text: "If the noble houses are so volatile, what sense is there in keeping them?"

traits.locale_text: "Wenn die Adelshäuser so unzuverlässig sind, warum behalten wir sie dann?"

languages.text: « Si les maisons nobles sont aussi agitées, pourquoi ne pas nous en débarrasser ? »
languages.original_text: "If the noble houses are so volatile, what sense is there in keeping them?"

traits.locale_text: « Si les maisons nobles sont aussi agitées, pourquoi ne pas nous en débarrasser ? »

languages.text: "Madem soylu haneler böylesine dönek, o hâlde neden onları aradan çıkarmıyoruz?"
languages.original_text: "If the noble houses are so volatile, what sense is there in keeping them?"

traits.locale_text: "Madem soylu haneler böylesine dönek, o hâlde neden onları aradan çıkarmıyoruz?"
